name: Sphere
headline: AI-powered sales tax, VAT and GST compliance
description:
Sphere helps US software companies manage their global sales tax / VAT / GST compliance requirements.

Our platform helps with everything from nexus monitoring, registration, calculation and filing/remittance.

Companies like Runway AI choose our platform because we’re the only product that offers true global coverage, is easy to implement and reasonably priced.

- We're growing rapidly (20%+ MoM revenue growth) and have signed customers like Runway AI, Sierra AI, Codeium + many more
- We're building the world's first tax-focused LLMs (which we believe will be the foundation for a broader cross border compliance platform; think Deel for international billing)
- We're well funded by Felicis Ventures and the founders of Flexport, Lyft, Betterup, Go1 and Xendit

founders.name: Nicholas Rudder, Founder
founders.description: I'm the Co-Founder and CEO of Sphere, living in SF but originally hailing from the sunny shores of Sydney, Australia. My background is in both tech and finance.

## Fully managed international indirect tax solution
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/67767559770bb723fad67cfe_world.avif)
### Unmatched global coverage
Sphere offers end-to-end tax compliance solutions with the broadest jurisdiction coverage on the market. Our AI-enabled tax technology and global tax authority integrations ensure seamless operations for businesses of all sizes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/67767713186fdbae29081376_Unmached%20global%20coverage.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/67793cf78eef71bc636907be_Growing-companies%20\(1\).avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/677675596bba83fee2edc20f_trending-up.avif)
### Made for fast growing companies
Our platform was designed to help finance teams quickly expand internationally. We’re easy to setup / maintain, plug straight into your billing stack and can run on autopilot. Grow globally without worrying about non-compliance or regulatory requirements.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/677676d71c184d367bdc4d64_bulb%20\(1\).avif)
### AI-enabled accuracy & scalability
Our platform combines tax-focused AI systems with expert tax professionals, ensuring accurate tax reporting and compliance with tax laws worldwide. No matter what product you sell or where you sell it, Sphere makes sure your business stays compliant across multiple jurisdictions; seamlessly handling tax obligations every step of the way.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/67793ce5201503e26f17fad7_AI-enabled.avif)

## How It Works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65de23ac84798e81851ea210/65e732558719f58b75a50f64_lines-bg-effect%20\(1\).svg)
## Monitor
We integrate with your billing stack and payroll provider to alert you when you need to register for tax in a jurisdiction.
![Wordmap photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/66ccbc85b5e370173173204e_Frame%201000001482.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65de23ac84798e81851ea210/65e732558719f58b75a50f64_lines-bg-effect%20\(1\).svg)
## Register
Simplify registration across multiple jurisdictions. Sphere handles government portals and submissions for you.
![Register Map](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/65f45828357fed6f2f2b13f9_register-map%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65de23ac84798e81851ea210/65e732558719f58b75a50f64_lines-bg-effect%20\(1\).svg)
## Calculate & Collect
Our AI-enabled tax engine ensures accurate tax calculation and collection, whether it’s sales tax, VAT, or GST.
![Calculate & Collect](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/65f4589c3512fc5702eedd4e_calculate-collect%20\(1\).svg)![Calculate & Collect](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/65f4589c3512fc5702eedd4e_calculate-collect%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65de23ac84798e81851ea210/65e732558719f58b75a50f64_lines-bg-effect%20\(1\).svg)
## File & Remit
We ensure all filings are submitted and collections remitted to the relevant tax authorities; on time, every time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/679e170f966d06f9e515e42f_File%20&%20remit.svg)![File Remit](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6568ff32844aa7d94714b1c3/65f458d8a45a0c4fea7dd1a0_file-remit%20\(1\).svg)

If you’re in the SaaS space but feeling bogged down by tax complexities, Sphere could very well be your ally in the ever-changing landscape of global tax regulations. They’re not just solving a problem; they’re innovating how companies manage tax compliance across borders.
